channel.title: 525 npcs code error [PI]

item.title: 525 npcs code error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

Im getting an error when i compile. I added this code into client.java

[code] public static byte[] getData(String s) {
return FileOperations.ReadFile(s);
}

	Stream = new ByteBuffer(getData("./npc.dat"));
    ByteBuffer stream2 = new ByteBuffer(getData("./npc.idx")); [/code]

and this is my error

Java/client.java:941: <identifier> expected Stream = new ByteBuffer(getData("./npc.dat")); ^

I was adding 525 npcs. help, please and thank you.

Read full topic
